News.headline: Extended Highlights: FC Halifax Town 2 - 1 Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Extended Highlights: FC Halifax Town 2 - 1 Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Extended Highlights: FC Halifax Town 2 - 1 Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: Fans can now access highlights on YouTube and extended highlights on Daggers PlayerHD of Tuesday's Emirates FA Cup fixture against FC Halifax Town.
News.description:
Short, YouTube highlights can be found here or by clicking 'play' below.  

Daggers PlayerHD subscribers can watch extended highlights from the game here.
